articles.description: As Derek Chauvin's trial in the death of George Floyd begins Monday, there's a particularly wide gulf between the societal issues at stake and the legal issues that will be the trial's focus.
articles.title: Derek Chauvin is on trial for George Floyd's death. America's criminal justice system is not - CNN
